mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTENT, ISUPDATED, DATE) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{content}, #{isUpdated}, #{date})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, ISUPDATED = #{isUpdated} WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO _LIKE (PARENT_ID, MEMBER_ID, PARENT_TYPE, LIKE_TYPE) VALUES (#{parent_id}, #{member_id}, #{parent_type}, #{like_type})
